languages.text: {n}Навигатор раздраженно смахивает прядь окровавленных волос.{/n} "Уж мне ли не знать! Все произошло слишком быстро — десятки донесений об авариях, жертвах, сбоях систем... Но единственная ценность на этой станции — жизнь госпожи Кассии. Остальное пустое и можно восполнить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Навигатор раздраженно смахивает прядь окровавленных волос.{/n} "Уж мне ли не знать! Все произошло слишком быстро — десятки донесений об авариях, жертвах, сбоях систем... Но единственная ценность на этой станции — жизнь госпожи Кассии. Остальное пустое и можно восполнить".

languages.text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."
languages.original_text: {n}Навигатор раздраженно смахивает прядь окровавленных волос.{/n} "Уж мне ли не знать! Все произошло слишком быстро — десятки донесений об авариях, жертвах, сбоях систем... Но единственная ценность на этой станции — жизнь госпожи Кассии. Остальное пустое и можно восполнить".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloody hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of calamities, victims and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is mistress Cassia's life. Everything else is of little value and can be easily replenished."

Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."

languages.text: {n}Der Navigator wischt sich gereizt eine blutige Haarsträhne aus dem Gesicht.{/n} "Glaubt mir, ich sollte es wissen! Es ist alles zu schnell gegangen, es gab Dutzende von Berichten über Unfälle, Opfer und ausfallende Systeme ... Doch das einzig Wertvolle an Bord dieser Station ist Lady Cassias Leben. Alles andere ist nutzlos und lässt sich leicht ersetzen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Navigator wischt sich gereizt eine blutige Haarsträhne aus dem Gesicht.{/n} "Glaubt mir, ich sollte es wissen! Es ist alles zu schnell gegangen, es gab Dutzende von Berichten über Unfälle, Opfer und ausfallende Systeme ... Doch das einzig Wertvolle an Bord dieser Station ist Herrin Cassias Leben. Alles andere ist nutzlos und lässt sich leicht ersetzen."

languages.text: {n}Le navigateur repousse d'un geste irrité une mèche de cheveux ensanglantée.{/n} « J'en ai bien conscience ! Tout s'est passé si vite. On m'a signalé des dizaines d'incidents, de victimes et de défaillances des systèmes... Mais la seule chose précieuse à bord de cette station est la vie de dame Cassia. Le reste est futile et pourra être facilement remplacé. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le navigateur repousse d'un geste irrité une mèche de cheveux ensanglantée.{/n} « J'en ai bien conscience ! Tout s'est passé si vite. On m'a signalé des dizaines d'incidents, de victimes et de défaillances des systèmes... Mais la seule chose précieuse à bord de cette station est la vie de maîtresse Cassia. Le reste est futile et pourra être facilement remplacé. »

languages.text: {n}导航者烦躁地拂去一缕沾着血的头发。{/n}“相信我，这件事情我很清楚！一切都发生得太快了，关于事故、受害者和系统故障的报告多达好几十份……不过，在这座星站里，唯一重要的事情就是卡西娅女士的性命，其他的一切都无足轻重，而且很容易恢复原状。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."

traits.locale_text: {n}导航者烦躁地拂去一缕沾着血的头发。{/n}“相信我，这件事情我很清楚！一切都发生得太快了，关于事故、受害者和系统故障的报告多达好几十份……不过，在这座星站里，唯一重要的事情就是卡西娅女士的性命，其他的一切都无足轻重，而且很容易恢复原状。”

languages.text: {n}航宙士は、苛立って血まみれの髪を払いのける。{/n}「信じてくれ、わかっているんだよ！何もかも目にも止まらぬ速さで起こって、事故、犠牲者、システム障害の報告が何十件も上がり…だが、このステーションで唯一の大切なものは、カシア様の命に他ならない。他の全ては些細な事で、簡単に替えがきく」
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."

traits.locale_text: {n}航宙士は、苛立って血まみれの髪を払いのける。{/n}「信じてくれ、普段はこうじゃない！何もかも目にも止まらぬ速さで起こって、事故、犠牲者、システム障害の報告が何十件も上がり…だが、このステーションにある重視すべきものは、カシア様の命に他ならない。他の全ては些細な事で、簡単に補填できる」
{n}航宙士は、苛立って血まみれの髪を払いのける。{/n}「信じてくれ、わかっているんだよ！何もかも目にも止まらぬ速さで起こって、事故、犠牲者、システム障害の報告が何十件も上がり…だが、このステーションで唯一の大切なものは、カシア様の命に他ならない。他の全ては些細な事で、簡単に替えがきく」

languages.text: {n}El navegante, irritado, se aparta un mechón de pelo ensangrentado.{/n} «¡Créame, soy consciente de ello! Todo sucedió demasiado rápido. Llegaban informes y más informes de accidentes, víctimas y fallos de sistema... Pero lo único verdaderamente valioso en la estación es la vida de lady Cassia. Todo lo demás es insignificante y se puede sustituir con facilidad».
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."

traits.locale_text: {n}El navegante, irritado, se aparta un mechón de pelo ensangrentado.{/n} «¡Créame, soy consciente de ello! Todo sucedió demasiado rápido. Llegaban informes y más informes de accidentes, víctimas y fallos de sistema... Pero lo único verdaderamente valioso en la estación es la vida de la señora Cassia. Todo lo demás es insignificante y se puede sustituir con facilidad».

languages.text: {n}Rotacı, bir tutam kanlı saç telini hışımla yüzünden çekiyor.{/n} "Farkındayım, merak etme! Her şey bir anda oluverdi. Ardı ardına kaza raporları, yaralılar, çöken sistemler derken ne olduğunu anlayamadık. Bu istasyonda kıymetli tek bir şey var, o da Leydi Cassia'nın hayatı. Diğer her şey boş. Hepsinin yerine yenisi konulabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator irritably brushes away a strand of bloodied hair.{/n} "Trust me, I should know! Everything happened too quickly, there were dozens of reports of accidents, victims, and failing systems... But the only precious thing aboard this station is Lady Cassia's life. Everything else is futile and can be easily replenished."
